item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-20
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Sonoma with her arms crossed #
  • Is there some sort of big comic book convention going on this week? People seem to be mentioning it a whole lot in the blogs. #humor #
  • RT @SingularityDsgn: Candy.com Sets Up Shop After $3 Million Domain Name Sale (via @TazaChocolate) #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
